page.title: 04UP HATHERLEY DEVELOPMENT
page.content: 1.Are you in favour of the{new {estate? 2.Do you think there should be more {facilities}for{young children}in this area? 3.Do you think the{link road}should be built now,in{2 years time}or as proposed,in{1992? ANSWERS: 1.The people who lived opposite the estate mainly objected to it,but the people who lived away from it did not mind,saying"People must have homes." RESULT:10 were in favour and 10 were not. 2.15 people said"Yes"and 5 said"No". 3.The results were 19 people thought the link road should be finished now, 1 person said it should be finished in 1992.Such remarks as"It will lessen the traffic,it will cost less now and the sooner the better",were made.
